room_title: Escape room "Camp Crystal Lake" by Bust Out Escape Room in Albuquerque
review: Had a blast at Camp Crystal Lake. It was our very first time at an escape room and we look forward to going back. The staff was fun and friendly too!

room_title: Escape room "Camp Crystal Lake" by Bust Out Escape Room in Albuquerque
review: My family and I just spent our second visit here. We did the Camp Crystal Lake Xscape Room and it was way too amazing! It was scary and intense! I'm that person that screams at every little thing! Definitely going again very soon!

room_title: Escape room "Camp Crystal Lake" by Bust Out Escape Room in Albuquerque
review: The Camp Crystal Lake room is terrifying! I almost cried! (In a good way.) Most fun I've had in a very long time! Worth the money for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Camp Crystal Lake" by Bust Out Escape Room in Albuquerque
review: This was my first time trying an escape room, and since it was a Friday the 13th themed room I was excited. I don't want to give anything away about this room, it was fun, slightly difficult, and had me sweating. Great staff, nice building, and movie related theme make me give them a great rating.
